values:
On a stoned whim, i read some of my old LJ posts


All I know is that I could have used a xanax prescription in high school... that or a fat sack of skunk with a couple white owl blunts
wow, i still have one of these things?
Last night consited of hilariously large joints, 40's of mickeys, and the rowdiest game of hackey-sack that this country has seen since aught-four.

Holy shit... Ive done more physically today then I have in a long time, and shit, it feels pretty good.

Rode at Keystone today with Deuce. Shot around the backside of the mountain for a while, then hit the park for the rest of the day. Finally got frontside boardslides down (I pulled a nice fronside to switch on the 20 foot park bench rail). Hopefully the picture of it came out good. 

While i should be proud about landing a new trick, its hard to be when there was so many good kids that were half of my age there. Apparently, Sports illustrated for kids thought it would be fun to host a search for the "next generation of snowboarding stars". Kids from all over the country came to Keystone on my riding day and took over the park

me: 20 foot boardslide to switch.

8 year old that went after me: switch backside boardslide to 50-50 to frontside boardslide to 270 off.

Fuck! When I was that age I was playing sega and burning army men. Kids these days...

After this, I went to rugby practice. goddamn it was tough. So many squat jumps and linouts. Even thouhg i can barely move my legs, it feels good to push myself like that

Now its time to do microeconomics, logic, AND anthropology homework. It feels good to do something with the day...

An update on my summer: 

Ive found out that the Zumiez up here is hiring. If I get the job, Im will stay here. While Zumiez is a shit place to work (mall "skateshops" suck greatly), its at least considered "skateshop experience". After talking to my roomate, he says that all good shops require that to work in them, and if I had it, he could probably get me a job at the shop he works at (The Wright life). Since the skateboard/snowboard industry is something i would LOVE to get in to, I think this would be very benificial.

Ok, so now im really debating staying here for the summer. If I can get a couple jobs, i think it would work out. Also, I hear the summer is a really fun time to be around Fort Collins.

In the end, the only two things left for me in chicago are my friends and family. But those are big things, and I dont know if Im ready to not see them for the summer.

Ok, so heres the deal. I really want to know what everyone thinks of this, so please give me your honest answer. I could really use the responses.

So, last weekend I went down to Austin, Texas for a rugby tournament. While there, one night i went to a club with everyone else on the team, even though I knew it wasnt my thing. So, while sitting around on the side drinking beers, I started talking to this girl. One thing led to another, and we ended up back at her place. Now Im not one for one night stands (I really dont like the idea of sleeping with random people), but I decided "hey, I havent gotten anything for a while, so why not". Well, the problem with everything is that over the course of the night, I actually started to like her... a lot. She just seemed to be going in the same direction in life as me, which is all I ever wanted in a girl. She liked the same things (music, snowboarding, etc), was good looking, partied the same way, and even felt the same way about what we were doing that night (we were both drunk, and it was both our first one night stand). Well, it did only last one night, as the second night i couldnt meet up with her because of extrenuous circumstances on both parties, so I left Austin with only her phone number.

Flash forward to this week. She was just a one night stand, right? just fuck and forget. But I cant forget. I  still think about her.  That night seemed almost like fate... why would two people who are so alike and who both went to a club only because their friends dragged them to it meet? She was so easy to talk to, I loved every minute of it.

My dilemma: do I call her? I honestly dont know what would come out of it; we both live so far away from each other, its not like we could date. But I cant stop thinking about her. I really have no fucking clue what to do

REally, it seems like love is a joke for me; like some supreme being is watching me and having a good fucking laugh. Whenever I meet someone I really like or love, there is always some little thing that fucks everything up. Some little variable that keeps me from being truely happ with that person. Look at my track record of relationships/ crushes/ etc, its all there.

to quote Neil Young "I'd cross the ocean for a heart of gold".

Went skating for the first time since thanksgiving break today down in Loveland. IT has been decided that a mini pipe will be made in our backyard in the coming weeks. A party will be thrown upon completion with 40's of mickeys and blunts. A good time will be had by all.

Well, last night before i leave. Everything is packed up and Im ready to hit the road.

If i didnt say buy to anyone, Im truely sorry. I'll admit, it was a little selfish, as I hate goodbyes. Its easier just to slip out when no one is looking.

This break was awesome. Damn all of you for not making me want to leave

Well, my parents arent as dumb as originally believed (they knew all along that I smoke pot), and arent as lame as originally believed (They basically told me that they were perfectly ok with it as long as I am smart).

Thats one mill stone off of my neck

To Everyone: 

Hope to see you at the cyrus show tonight. I will be there, most likely fairly high, so it should be a good time
I thought it would become less blatant in later CDs, but how could it with songs like "I love marijuana" and "Babylon dont touch my sensi". Trojan record's box set, "Ganja Reggae", is truely awesome

I just realized that I just lost two of my best friends here at CSU. Both of them are not coming back next semester and are staying on their respective coasts.


Frankly, i dont care if im listening to ben harper. This song reminds me of every session over at their crazy tweaker pad.

wow, i havent updated for a long time. Just dont see the need to update all the time anymore.

Its wierd that since i turned 20, my outlook on life has changed a lot. I really dont know what else to say.

Take the quiz: "What does your birth month reveal about you?"

December
Loyal and generous. Sexy. Patriotic. Active in games and interactions. Impatient and hasty. Ambitious. Influential in organizations. Fun to be with. Loves to socialize. Loves praises. Loves attention. Loves to be loved. Honest and trustworthy. Not pretending. Short tempered. Changing personality. Not egoistic. Take high pride in oneself. Hates restrictions. Loves to joke. Good sense of humor. Logical.

Lying in my plasic bed
thinkin how things weren't so cool to me
My baby likes to shoot pool
I like lying naked in my bedroom
Tying on the dinosaur
tonight it used to be so cool

Now I've got the needle
and I can't shake but I can't breathe
Take it away and I want more and more
One day I'm gonna lose the war

Lying in my plasic bed
thinkin how things weren't so cool to me
My baby likes to shoot pool
I like lying naked in my bedroom

Tying on the dinosaur
tonight it used to be so cool

Now I've got the needle
and I can't shake
but I can't breathe

Take it away and but I want more and more
One day I'm gonna lose the war

Holy shit


Steve, i am forever in your debt

Lil John - Stop fucking wit me is incredible. Anyone who samples slayer is truely the king of Crunk

Frankly, my life would be perfect if two things happened:

1. A Certain somone (alyson) would say a certain thing (i like you like you like me) and end all this speculation for me (Speculation is healthy, but im throuhg with it.)

2. I could find that Lil John song that sampled slayer

So I joined the college facebook mostly out of boredom and not wanting to do my Insect project. What picture should I post on there? Right now, there is two choices:

1. Something incredibly manly, like chugging a beer or grilling. Also, my old friendster pic of me smoking a cigarrette with an incredibly large M-16 replica could be used

2. Me throwing up the horns while ripping a bong.

Either would work well, so i throw myself to the Livejournal masses.

...Bethany, you know what im talking about.


Im excited because my mom just told me she can get me a job at midwestern university this christmas break filing and whatnot. That means many hungover days in an office doing mindless work for somewhere around 8-10 an hour. This will help my mother situation greatly.
can anyone suggest to me some good hip-hop and rap to download (steve im looking in your direction)?

For the past week, ive had this feeling like something big is going to happen. An event that comes along every year or so and changes your life.

Basically, Im just really anxious for tonight. Very anxious. I had a dream last night, one about the past. About very happy times that are no more. It made me a little sad, but made me even more excited about tonight.

Who knows? Maybe im reading too much into this. But deep down, i dont think so. There is something there, i can feel it.

When I put my name in jobpredictor.com, it said this:

"Graham French, Your ideal job is a God."


If i cant get into my sociology class, i am going to be royally pissed off. There is no such thing as a liberal arts major, so why is a whole class for them? Being a sociology major, I am supposedly under the school of liberal arts, so I should be able to register for the class.If this fucks up my plans of having thursday off for snowboarding, I am going to be royally pissed.

Other big things that have happened since the last update was that I went snowboarding for the first time this season on sunday, which was also my first day ever of true backcountry snowboarding. I hiked all the way up a mountain that was over 13,000 feet for just one run down. The hike took all day, and wasnt on a path. It was literally climbing up in snow that was up to my thighs. When we got to the top, the sun was setting and it felt like i was on top of the world. It was definitely one of the best runs I have ever taken, i can tell you that much.

I also bought a steppenwolf record. I could have bought the CD, but certain things are better on vinyl.

Oh yeah, and Dave Tayag, happy birthday. Sorry for the lateness.
(insert sarcastic comment about how shitty/scary the next four years are going to be here)

Frankly, anyone who didnt vote today that is allowed to effectively loses any right they have to criticize the government. 

I am going to be holed up in the house tonight, with a large selection of firearms and liquor, ready to defend myself when the shit hits the fan.

I feel better. A lot better. Things cant get better until you hit rock bottom, and emotionally, I think I reached that point during my last entry.

Things are going to get better. They are starting. They will continue.

baiscally, i hate my life now. Im happy at times, but Im not truely happy. So many questions... Where do I belong? Colorado? Chicago? somewhere else?

Who are my true friends? A lot of the time, it seems like people are just tolerating my presence.

...And love. Its been so long since I have actually loved someone. It feels so long that I dont really remember what it is. Any time I try to love something, whether romantically or just in a friendly manner, i get fucked. It feels like im just one of those people that is just undatable. Sorry if I sound jaded, but when it happens to you so many times, its hard not to be.

More and more, I am starting to believe what I think everybody thinks of me. I am worthless. Im a fuck-up. Im a third wheel in every situation. Im an awkward idiot with no chance with anyone except my right hand

I feel like a stranger in a strange place. If I left here, Im sure not many people would protest.  But, on the other hand, if I never came back to chicago, Im sure not many people would care. Just one less face in the crowd; Somone who no one gives a second glance to and does not really contribute to society. There should be a place to put everyone like me so we dont bother everyone else

wow. tonight was one of my top ten shows of all time... basically for one reason.


So as I gave the doorman my money, I held out my hands to get x'd up (as is the style for the underage kids at shows in denver). But, to my suprise, instead of marking my hands, he put a drinking wristband around it. So i spent the rest of the show drinking at the bar, with the occasional skanking break. Not to mince words, but i got tanked. So much fun
So tonight is mustard plug. I am going to get nice and liquored up for it. Also, Im probably getting in for free, which would rock hard.

Jumping on the bandwagon and making a new avatar. Cant decide if it looks anything like me, but at least the beer and the windmills are dead on.

This weekend was insane. Friday was filled with 15 gallons of jungle juice (w/ 3 handles of mckormics vodka and 3 handles of everclear in it) and a football game. Saturday was filled with rugby and more jungle juice. Sunday Stevo and I sat around his house, played video games, and got high. Perfect way to end the week.

The rugby game on saturday made me realize what I love most about rugby. The comrodery. It doesnt matter if you are on the opposite team, you still have the common bond that you are both playing rugby at that given time. When playing the Fort Collins men side, I made a particularly hard tackle on another player. After the ruck was over, the guy rolled away, and helped me up, saying "nice hit, you really fucked me up there". I think there would be less egos in sports if more athletes could show this level of sportsmenship.

yeah, i must say that stoner rock (boris, orange goblin, fu manchu) and Emile Durkheims Elementary Forms of Religious Life really go together.

Now here comes the Pink Floyd!

GWAR
Dying Fetus
All That Remains
7:00 pm
Ogden Theatre
Denver/Boulder
Some people need to stop hoping for things that they already have

Today i figured out that my roomate jake's sole purpose in life is to do anything in his power that will allow him to sit around and get stoned while playing warcraft. This includes eating and drinking too much of the communal supplies (We wont be buying anything together anymore) and not doing any work around the house. While mike and I have mowed the lawn, washed dishes, made our kitchen island, picked up house supplies, etc., etc., Jakes crowning moment was when he made ice cubes small enough to fit inside a bong. Brilliant!

I love when the incredibly close minded christian speakers come to preach on our plaza. Its so entertaining. But I also love hearing ignorant people try to shoot down the preachers dogma with facts they probably learned from the latest Epitaph release. Ahh, people suck

Well, that just pisses me off. I jsut spent an hour and a half building an island for our kitchen and all Jake could ask me about was when we were going to get our pot that someone owes us and when the kitchen was going to get cleaned up. Im sorry that you went through close to a thid of an ounce in a week, but getting you more weed is not the first thing on my mind. Oh yes, and when are those dishes going to get done, because im sure as hell not going to do all of them for the third time in a row.
Oh yes, and tomarrow Im going to call the hot girl in my speech class and see if she wants to hang out. Should either be awesome or craptastic

grilling up burgers at one in the morning is awesome. I love having my own place.

Somone named jessica called me from a denver area code tongiht during the game. I tried to call her back, and no one would pick up... Very odd.

Last night was a lot of fun. 80's parties do rule.

there is definitely a feeling of change in the air. I dont know what will actually happen, but i defeinitely feel a change, definintely for the better, coming

Holy shit... This weekend. What can I say? This weekend was very awesome, even though it was spent at a funeral. If you want a full update of the weekend, talk to me... You wont be disappointed.

Basically, this weekend was very good for me. I learned  that I never truly knew my grandpa. He had brain surgery before i was born, and I dont really remember him well without his dementia. The stories I heard about him sounded like a completely different person the i came to know as grandpa French(IE: Before his operation, he got into a serious debate with my uncle about the economic benefets of smoking dope instead of drinking). 

Seeing my whole family together was also great. I got to see all of my cousins who i never see because of the fact that we are scattered around the country. Getting completely shitfaced with my family was also a lot of fun. We must have toasted my grandpa about 10 times that night, moving from his favorite wine to beer to straight whiskey.

In the end, a weekend with my family did me good

Why does Boris rule so much?

Last night I achieved such an amazing level when I played Metal Slug 3 while listening to Heavy Rocks. It was close to a sensory orgasm as one could get

Thanks to Jose for the Metal Slug
Thanks to Doud for the jams

My grandpa died yesterday at around 1:30. While i am sad, it was really for the better. For the past 3 months, his dementia has really advanced rapidly, and for the past two weeks he has been mostly unresponsive.

The funeral is in not this weekend, but the next. This means that I will be back in chicago for at least some of next weekend.

Wyoming has to be the worst state ever. I have spent the better part of this weekend there for a rugby tournament and i never want to go back. Seriously, it only has three things going for it: Jackson Hole, Legal fireworks, and Booze are sold on Sundays (unlike in fort collins). The world would be a better place if Utah annexed Jackson Hole, and they made the rest of the state into one big liquor/fireworks store.
Rugby practice was incredibly hard, and the Southern comfort was white label (see last post) But I am  happy

In short, today has sucked. Everything that can go wrong has

Why the fuck are there lines out the door at the IMP? its the third week of it being open. There is no rush, so, to all the freshmen out there, chill the fuck out. You will  have enough time to finish everything. it doesnt need to be done in the first coupel weeks.

Rugby tonight will probably be mostly conditioning. This wont make my day better.

The only thing that really went well today was that campus west is selling handles of Southern Comfort for only 19.99. But, with my luck, its probably the white label SoCo.
I just downloaded copious amounts of Frank Zappa. Oh man, ive been missing out for so long
Just got back from Sams where I bought 5 pounds of potato salad for 2.88. I cant believe how much I rule

Just gave probably the best speech of my life. And now its the weekend. Should be quite the memorable one.... watching the CU vs. CSU game on TV tomarrow at Kyles on a fucking big screen. Then on sunday is the Alumni rugby game and party afterwards. For everyone in the big FC that is interested its over on howes all night on Sunday. It should be quite the big bash

Free personality analysis from ColorQuiz.com.
Generated on Wed Sep 1 16:47:57 2004.

      Your Existing Situation
            Sensitive and understanding but under some strain; needs to unwind in the company of someone close to him.
    
  Your Stress Sources
            Sensitive, and susceptible to gentleness and delicacy of feeling, with a desire to blend into some sort of mystic fusion of erotic harmony. However, this desire remains unsatisfied due to the lack of a suitable partner or adverse conditions, and he keeps a strict and watchful control on his emotional relationships as he needs to know precisely where he stands. Is fastidious, esthetic, and has a cultured taste which allows him to form and express his own taste and judgment, especially in the fields of art and artistic creativity. Strives to ally with others who can assist him in his intellectual or artistic growth.
     
 Your Restrained Characteristics
            Wants to broaden his fields of activity and insists that his hopes and ideas are realistic. Distressed by the fear that he may be prevented from doing what he wants; needs both peaceful conditions and quiet reassurance to restore his confidence.

            Very exacting in the standards he applies to his choice of a partner and seeking a rather unrealistic perfection in his sex life.


      Your Desired Objective
            Defiantly opposes any sort of restriction or opposition. Sticks obstinately to his own point of view in the belief that this proves his independence and self-determination.
      
Your Actual Problem
            His natural ability to examine everything with critical discrimination has been distorted into an attitude of harsh disapproval, which opposes and denigrates without regard to the real facts.
     
 Your Actual Problem #2
            The need for esteem--for the chance to play some outstanding part and make a name for himself--has become imperative. He reacts by insisting on being the center of attention, and refuses to play an impersonal or minor role.

You know what? Fuck this. I am fucking tired of everything turning up shit. I am fucking tired of being passed up. Increaingly, I keep getting the feeling that my whole life is some sitcom for others to watch, and when things go to fuck, i can almost hear the laugh track in the background. Thsi leads me to the question Who did I fuck over to ahve such shitty karma?
